list.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="wrap_content"
    background="#FFFFFFFF"
    orientation="vertical"
    paddingLeft="20dp" >

    <RelativeLayout
        id="@+id/column_item_subscript"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="42dp"
        function="subscript_frame"
        orientation="horizontal"
        visibility="gone" >

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/column_item_subscript_img"
            layout_width="wrap_content"
            layout_height="wrap_content"
            layout_alignParentBottom="true"
            layout_marginBottom="5dp"
            contentDescription="@null"
            function="subscript_img"
            src="subscribe_header" />
    </RelativeLayout>

    <RelativeLayout
        id="@+id/column_item_row"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="42dp"
        click="true"
        function="frame_content"
        orientation="horizontal" >

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/cloumn_item_color"
            layout_width="25dp"
            layout_height="25dp"
            layout_centerVertical="true"
            function="image" />

        <TextView
            id="@+id/column_item_name"
            layout_width="wrap_content"
            layout_height="wrap_content"
            layout_centerVertical="true"
            layout_marginLeft="13dp"
            layout_toRightOf="@+id/cloumn_item_color"
            function="title"
            textColor="#FF000000"
            textSize="16dp" />
    </RelativeLayout>

    <LinearLayout
        id="@+id/column_item_divider"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="1dp"
        background="line"
        function="divider"
        orientation="horizontal" />

</LinearLayout>

head.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="match_parent"
    layout_height="wrap_content"
    orientation="vertical" >

    <ImageView
        layout_width="match_parent"
        layout_height="width*0.365"
        function="column_log"
        src="column_logo" />

    <View
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="2dp"
        background="line" />

</LinearLayout>
